mapper.select:
select * from ppm_indicator_val m
and m.guid = #GUID#
and m.indicatorid = #INDICATORID#
and m.indicatorname = #INDICATORNAME#
and m.indicatoryear = #INDICATORYEAR#
and m.indicatormonth = #INDICATORMONTH#
and m.indicatorguid = #INDICATORGUID#
and m.dismension1 = #DISMENSION1#
and m.dismension2 = #DISMENSION2#
and m.dismension3 = #DISMENSION3#
and m.dismension4 = #DISMENSION4#
and m.dismension5 = #DISMENSION5#
and m.dismension6 = #DISMENSION6#
and m.dismension7 = #DISMENSION7#
and m.dismension8 = #DISMENSION8#
and m.dismension9 = #DISMENSION9#
and m.dismension10 = #DISMENSION10#
and m.indicatoryear >= #FROMYEAR#
and m.indicatoryear >= #TOYEAR#
and m.indicatormonth <= #FROMMONTH#
and m.indicatormonth <= #TOMONTH#
mapper.insert: insert into ppm_indicator_val (guid, indicatorid, indicatorname, indicatoryear, indicatormonth, dismension1, dismension2, dismension3, dismension4, dismension5, dismension6, dismension7, dismension8, dismension9, dismension10, resval, createtime, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #INDICATORID#, #INDICATORNAME#, #INDICATORYEAR#, #INDICATORMONTH#, #DISMENSION1#, #DISMENSION2#, #DISMENSION3#, #DISMENSION4#, #DISMENSION5#, #DISMENSION6#, #DISMENSION7#, #DISMENSION8#, #DISMENSION9#, #DISMENSION10#, #RESVAL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ppm_indicator_val
indicatorid = #INDICATORID#, indicatorname = #INDICATORNAME#, indicatoryear = #INDICATORYEAR#, indicatormonth = #INDICATORMONTH#, dismension1 = #DISMENSION1#, dismension2 = #DISMENSION2#, dismension3 = #DISMENSION3#, dismension4 = #DISMENSION4#, dismension5 = #DISMENSION5#, dismension6 = #DISMENSION6#, dismension7 = #DISMENSION7#, dismension8 = #DISMENSION8#, dismension9 = #DISMENSION9#, dismension10 = #DISMENSION10#, resval = #RESVAL#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# where guid=#GUID#
mapper.delete:
delete from ppm_indicator_val
and indicatorid = #INDICATORID#
and year = #ANALYSISYEAR#
and indicatormonth = #INDICATORMONTH#
